name: DS Pictochat UI
description:
The pictochat UI components for the Nintendo DS with a sample mock up of the DS Lite!


Global design components allow you to change the DS shell color, chat theme and font colors, and edit messages and usernames.


Great for practicing global components and smart animate. Could potentially be exported into after effects for more animations.


disclaimer : I'm not associated with Nintendo, this was a side project to practice global components and share with others to see what animations they would make
